name: Asterball
description:
Asterball is an online third-person sports game where you play as a Sportsman on one of two teams in a game of gridiron, with a unique twist.

Levels

Asterball contains multiple different levels, each with their own unique gameplay elements. Battle it out in the classic Starfield, which takes you back to the basics. Or compete in the Warpgate, which challenges the players with limited platforms and portals.

Items

Each Sportsman can gain points during gameplay from various tasks, such as scoring touchdowns or tackling other players. These points ca be used to gain advantageous items to help. Items only last for the round, but can help gain an edge on the opponent in different ways. The Sportsman can purchase the electrifying Lightning Rod to gain a huge increase in speed, or can play on the offensive with the Pulse Bomb, causing targets to be knocked back.
